Col2: Randomly-generated tickers starting with the letters A or B
Largest 20 tickers by market cap beginning with the letter A
Equal-Weighting as of close of the Calculation Day
Index Base Date: December 31st of Year 0
Index Inception Date: December 31st of Year 0
No index levels will be published on index holidays
Calculation Day: Last business day of the calendar quarter
Rebalance Day: Fifth business day of the calendar quarter
(Index constituent weights will be converted to share counts)
Share counts will remain constant into Rebalance Day unless Corporate Action
Acquisition will result in the removal of that name from the index on the close
prior to delisting and weight will be redistributed across all assets
Income redistributed across constituents on the close prior to ex-date
